Interface Object2D

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    FireTrap, GameObject, Humanoid, LineWalkZombie, MasterZombie, Player, RandomWalkZombie, Tile, Zombie

    public interface Object2D
    Interface that sets up methods for GameObject to use.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.awt.Rectangle getBoundingRectangle()
      Get the bounding rectangle for the object
      double getDistance(Object2D other)
      Get the euclidean distance of 1 object to another
      int getHeight() 
      Location getLocation()
      Get the location of an object which contains the row, col, and x and y coordinates.
      int getWidth() 
      boolean intersects(Object2D other)
      Does this object intersect another? (Checking if the bounding rectangles intersect will generally suffice.)

    • Method Detail

        Returns:

      • intersects

        boolean intersects(Object2D other)
        Does this object intersect another? (Checking if the bounding rectangles intersect will generally suffice.)
        Parameters:
        other - The other object to check.
        Returns:
        True if objects intersect.
